channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Furniture on pavement outside house for weeks, 31st December
item.description:
Outside no 6 Spencer Gardens a number of mattresses and furniture has been on the pavement outside the house. We understand they are waiting for Greenwich council to pick up. We had to walk on the far side of the pavement to avoid it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spencer Gardens, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 potholes increasing in size- probably a foot square and several inches deep, 31st December
item.description:
This area of road has been repaired several times but potholes keep appearing. It clearly needs a better resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London

item.title: Dog Mess on footpath, 31st December
item.description:

item.title: The footpath barrier is severely bent, 31st December
item.description:
The footpath barrier is severely bent and making it very difficult for those with pushchairs/prams or for people with mobility issues to negotiate the spaces to give access to or egress from Cranston Road to Vancouver Road along the linking footpath and lane,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranston Road, Perry Vale, Greater London

item.title: Half done job on cutting down trees in the park, 30th December
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Abandoned Lime Bikes, 30th December
item.description:
Greenwich area around Maze Hill towards Greenwich Market is strewn with abandoned Lime bikes. It's quite an eyesore. Is something being down about the number of abandoned bikes.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bardsley Lane, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on Electric Vehicle machine and street boxes along Stockwell Road SW9 OTZ outside Morant House, 30th December
item.description:
I like to report an influx of graffiti along Stockwell Road SW9. The graffiti is very visible at residential flat entries and lower section of walls. Also on street boxes along the stretch. Electric vehicle charging points especially outside 25 Morant house on the main road. Please could the graffiti be removed. The graffiti has been there for approximately three weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Road, Stockwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I almost got robbed by two people in the night around 9pm behind the school there’s no street light, 30th December
item.description:
Almost got robbed and don’t feel safe anymore plus that I’m new to the area thankfully my dogs were there to safe me

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whinchat Road, Thamesmead
